BPCparam.comment_bpdMode: control the bad pixel detection mode: 0-Based on Green data detection, 1-Based on Bayer data detection
BPCparam.comment_singletHotFactor: control the detection of singlets of hot pixels in the sky and land respectively, first line parameters represent land, second line parameters represent sky
BPCparam.comment_coupletHotFactor: control the detection of couplets of hot pixels in the sky and land respectively, first line parameters represent land, second line parameters represent sky
BPCparam.comment_tripletHotFactor: control the detection of triplets of hot pixels in the sky and land respectively, first line parameters represent land, second line parameters represent sky
BPCparam.comment_singletColdFactor: control the detection of singlets of cold pixels in the sky and land respectively, first line parameters represent land, second line parameters represent sky
BPCparam.comment_coupletColdFactor: control the detection of couplets of cold pixels in the sky and land respectively, first line parameters represent land, second line parameters represent sky
BPCparam.comment_tripletColdFactor: control the detection of triplets of cold pixels in the sky and land respectively, first line parameters represent land, second line parameters represent sky
